title: Features
subtitle: Discover the powerful capabilities of SlideJS

hero.title: Generate Slide Presentations from Any Data Source
hero.description: SlideJS provides a comprehensive solution for generating slide presentations from Quiz, Survey, Form, and other data sources using declarative DSL, supporting multiple rendering engines.

editorjsIntegration.title: Declarative DSL
editorjsIntegration.description: Define slide structure using concise DSL syntax with rule engine and nested loops.
details: Declarative syntax, easy to understand and maintain
Support for start, content, end rules
Nested for loops for complex data structures

multipleTypes.title: Multiple Render Engines
multipleTypes.description: Support for multiple popular slide rendering engines to meet different presentation needs.

dsl.title: Slide DSL
dsl.description: Declarative domain-specific language for generating slide presentations from any data source.
details: Support for expression evaluation and for loops

themeSystem.title: Theme System
themeSystem.description: Flexible theme system with multiple built-in themes and custom theme support.
details: Multiple built-in themes (light, dark, solarized, etc.)

frameworkIntegration.title: Multiple Render Engines
frameworkIntegration.description: Support for multiple popular slide rendering engines.

typeSafety.title: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: Complete TypeScript support with comprehensive type definitions.

modular.title: Modular Design
modular.description: Use core components independently with flexible configuration.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Works on all devices and screen sizes.
